cause.description:
Everyday people are killed through the mistake of drunk driving. Innocent lives are taken and we need to put an end to this terrible irresponsible act. So help to stop this.
1. Innocent lives are taken
2. Drunk drivers need to know the consiquences of their actions.
3. Drunk driving can ruin someones life for ever whether its the user or a victem.
cause.mission: To help make a stop to drunk driving.
cause.name: MADD
